fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: In the day or night, engulf the victim of murder or lynching in flames, cleaning their body and hiding their role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If this is rolled and no Fox Heads are rolled, roll a Fox Head.n- You may burn your own teammates.
- You may use your ability and use the night kill at the same time.
- When using your ability in the day, you must use it before the day ends for it to work.
